blocks.content: FieldLogs provides a simple tree based enterprise structure that an administrator of an Enterprise account can build and maintain. An administrator can select 'Add' in the Hierarchy toolbar and select what type of structural element they wish to add. Below is a breakdown of these:

points.text: Groups are general entities that group members and all the other structural elements to build the tree structure. Groups, for example, can be nested inside a Groups.
Template DBs are databases of Templates with the same level of access as other entities inside its parent group.
Lifecycles are specific authoring workflows for Templates that produce 'Published' Templates and store them in Template DB's
